title: Transmigration: The Farm Life of a “Fool” - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Childcare   Cute Children   Devoted Love Interests   Familial Love   Family   Farming   Hard-Working Protagonist   Mpreg   Poor to Rich   Seme Protagonist   Transmigration
author: 子溪
description: Xu Ran has been working in a company for two years after graduating from college. It takes him so much effort to finally get a promotion. While immersed in the elation of this great news, he accidentally falls down the stairs. By the time he wakes up, he transmigrates to a world where there are only men. To his surprise, he turns into a fool who has a spouse. His spouse is a man taller than him and has given birth to twin boys. His father doesn't like him and his daddy even hates his guts. What's worse, there are people who are always thinking about how to kill him. In order to make a living, Xu Ran has to rise up to fight. He makes up his mind to do the farm work so as to earn money and build up the family fortunes.>
